pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, September 9, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

Private meetings

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will have a working lunch with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan.

Closed to media

National Capital Region, Canada

The Prime Minister will sign the book of condolences for Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
